CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Sales_Survey__r.Local_Office_Region__c, "Northeast – PDC, TRS, NEE"), "NH230160@ncr.com", IF( ISPICKVAL(Sales_Survey__r.Local_Office_Region__c, "Southeast – CAR, FLA, ATL"), "SH230289@ncr.com", IF( ISPICKVAL(Sales_Survey__r.Local_Office_Region__c, "Central – OHD, MIN, CHI"), "CH230242@ncr.com", IF( ISPICKVAL(Sales_Survey__r.Local_Office_Region__c, "Texas – AUS, DFW, SAT, HOU"), "TH230169@ncr.com", IF( ISPICKVAL(Sales_Survey__r.Local_Office_Region__c, "West – NOC, LVN, RMT"), "WH230054@ncr.com", "IS230122@ncr.com")))))
CustomField.label: LO Region Group
